articles.title: Plasterer, 50, who posted 'abhorrent' video racially abusing three England players is spared jail - Daily Mail
articles.description: Plasterer Bradford Pretty, 50, embarked on a drunken tirade against Marcus Rashford, Jadon Sancho and Bukayo Saka after the loss on penalties to Italy in July.
articles.content:
A father-of-three who posted an 'abhorrent' video on Facebook racially abusing three England players after the Euro 2020 final has been spared jail.

articles.title: Salah, Mane, Pogba feature in scary-looking Prem XI of contract concerns... - Football365
articles.description: You could pick Liverpool's whole front three in this XI of PL players giving their clubs food for thought over their contracts. But we didn't. Still, it's a frightening front six...
